sentences.en: Any shortage could push up grain prices.
sentences.cn: 任何一种短缺都会抬高粮食价格。

sentences.en: Encourage your kids to try new things, but try not to push them too hard.
sentences.cn: 要鼓励你的孩子们尝试新鲜事物，不过尽量不要逼得太紧。

sentences.en: He gave me a sharp push.
sentences.cn: 他猛地推了我一下。

sentences.en: he promised to push ahead with economic reform.
sentences.cn: 他允诺继续推行经济改革。

sentences.en: I earn enough to push the boat out now and again.
sentences.cn: 我挣的钱足以时不时摆摆阔了。

sentences.en: I promised to push him on the swings for as long as he wanted.
sentences.cn: 我答应他想在秋千上荡多久我就推多久。

sentences.en: I saw her push the boulder down on you.
sentences.cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

sentences.en: It didn’t move, so she pushed harder.
sentences.cn: 它一动不动，因此她加力去推。

sentences.en: Make deep slashes in the meat and push in the spice paste.
sentences.cn: 在肉上切出深深的口子，再把辣酱塞进切口中。

sentences.en: Ministers will push the case for opening the plant.
sentences.cn: 部长们将极力劝说人们接受开办工厂一事。

sentences.en: Push the tiny lever on the lock.
sentences.cn: 按一下锁上的小柄。

sentences.en: shoppers pushing their grocery carts
sentences.cn: 推着购物车的购物者

sentences.en: The army may push southwards into the Kurdish areas.
sentences.cn: 军队可能南下向库尔德地区挺进。

sentences.en: The infantry patrol pushed off before dawn.
sentences.cn: 巡逻队于黎明前离去了

sentences.en: The path was barely visible, but we pushed on.
sentences.cn: 几乎看不见路了，但是我们继续前进

sentences.en: The rebels continue their push towards the beleaguered capital.
sentences.cn: 叛军继续向四面被围的首都推进。

sentences.en: there's room for four people, or five at a push.
sentences.cn: 有容纳四个人的空间，挤一挤可容下五个人。

sentences.en: Two cabinet ministers also got the push.
sentences.cn: 两位内阁大臣也被撤职了。

sentences.en: We are continuing to push the business forward.
sentences.cn: 我们正在继续推进业务的发展。

sentences.en: We found the vac easy to push.
sentences.cn: 我们发现这种真空吸尘器很容易推着走。

sentences.en: We might be able to push ourselves across with the paddle.
sentences.cn: 我们也许可以用桨把自己推过去。

sentences.en: when push came to shove, I always stood up for him.
sentences.cn: 在紧要关头我总是支持他。

sentences.en: When push comes to shove, you are on your own.
sentences.cn: 如果形势糟糕，你就只能靠自己了。

sentences.en: You have to push the throttle forward for more power.
sentences.cn: 你得把油门杆往前推来加大马力。

words.tran_cn: 富有进取心的；有精力的
奋斗的；莽撞的；有精力的；富有进取心的
有进取心的；爱出风头的；有冲劲的；固执己见的
推进器；推进式飞机；推销员；非法销售者
推挤；推人犯规（篮球术语）
推；决心；奋力；攻击；干劲；进取心
推；推进；增加；伸展；努力争取

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)在紧急时刻，不得已时；稍微困难地

phrases.phrase: get (或 give someone) the push (或 shove)

phrases.tran_cn: 继续进行（或推行）行动路线（或政策）
(英, 非正式)离开，离去；起程
粗暴对待，胁迫：粗暴地对待或威胁要粗暴地对待；恐吓，威胁

phrases.phrase: push at (或 against) an open door

phrases.tran_cn: 继续前进：沿着某人的路继续或前进
(非正式)自以为会继续成功（或受宠）
鞭策自己；发愤；自强；加劲
(非正式)粗暴对待；把…差来谴去，摆布；欺侮；烦扰
(非正式)在必须采取行动（或做出决定）时；在紧要关头；在迫不得已时

trans.tran_cn: 推，进攻，坚定的努力，激励

trans.tran_en: to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc

trans.tran_cn: 推（进），按，力劝，督促，迫使…（生气），推销，贩卖，挺近，推行，冒险
trans.tran_en: to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc
